QuestData.Title: Harpy Lieutenants
QuestData.Description: The only way to stop the harpy raiders is to destroy their chain of command. The harpies are led by fearless lieutenants, Witchwing Slayers. If the Slayers fall, the rest will follow.$B$BGo to the Dry Hills and cut down the Witchwing Slayers. Make sure they die painfully, $n. We want those harpy wenches to know the idiocy of picking fights with the Horde.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Show those foul creatures that the Horde are not to be trifled with.
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: You are a worthy member of the Horde!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 6 Witchwing Slayers in the Dry Hills of the Northern Barrens.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you killed 6 Witchwing Slayers yet? Justice must be dealt to them for their vicious attacks on the Horde.
QuestData.RewardText: You examine the destruction around you and nod in satisfaction. The harpies' leaders have been dealt with. For now.
